name: Roly Poly (judiethai)
description:
Roly Poly is my senior thesis project at Moore College of Art & Design--for the Animation & Game Arts major. It is a 3D video game in which users play as a pill bug! Run, roll, and explore as you help out your bug friends in this tiny world.

Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/rRvaBL

Programmer & Artist: Judie Thai
Music: Spencer Edgers
SFX: Emanuel Whittington & Others

Changelogs:

*April 29, 2019 @ 6:45pm EST - fixed the Quit button
